snippets.name: URL Health Check
snippets.description: Quick validation to filter out low-quality company prospects by checking if their website is accessible

snippets.name: Business Legitimacy Check
snippets.description: Detects parked domains, placeholder pages, under construction sites, and other low-quality indicators

snippets.name: Company Maturity Check
snippets.description: Analyzes domain age, DNS/MX records, SSL certificates, and technology stack for maturity signals

snippets.name: Contactability Check
snippets.description: Extracts emails, phone numbers, social media links, and contact page presence

snippets.name: Site SEO Check
snippets.description: Analyzes on-page SEO factors, meta tags, performance, and crawlability signals
